CustomField.description: Shows Days for which case was in Customer Feedback status Consider Date_Time_Closed__c for the 184 Cases that have issue with incorrect ClosedDate
CustomField.formula: IF( Mig_Error_Case__c , Date_Time_Closed__c - Customer_Feedback_Documented_Date__c, ClosedDate - Customer_Feedback_Documented_Date__c )
CustomField.label: Customer Feedback Duration
